definition: large amount/staple/influential family of long standing
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: Log and wood pulp are large-volume imported forest products for China.
sentences.chinese: 原木和木漿是我國進口林產品中的大宗商品。

sentences.english: Stainless steel material is widely used as a bulk material in the Construction of Chemical Plant .
sentences.chinese: 不鏽鋼材料是化工裝置建設中的大宗用材之一。

sentences.english: It is now one of the leading Chinese group-buying websites.
sentences.chinese: 現在它成爲了中國大宗團購網站的領頭人之一。

sentences.english: Australian and Canadian Dollar also dropped pressured by commodity prices.
sentences.chinese: 受大宗商品價格的壓力，澳元和加拿大元也出現下滑。

sentences.english: Financial market can make inflation self-fulfilling through commodity speculation.
sentences.chinese: 金融市場可使通脹通過大宗商品投機而自我實現。

sentences.english: Tom got a lot of kickback in the awarding contract.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆在承包大宗工程當中收取了大量的回扣。

sentences.english: The commodity market may also be a long-term headwind for the global economy .
sentences.chinese: 大宗商品市場長期來說也可能與全球經濟頂風而行。

sentences.english: Yellow teas are made for the appreciation of locals and have never had a broad market presence.
sentences.chinese: 黃茶的出現應該感謝當地人民和並未出現大宗採購。

sentences.english: Parents, elders, such as bulk cases of cervical, in this case has a religious function.
sentences.chinese: 家長族長如大宗宗子，在這種情況下負有宗教職能。

sentences.english: The surge in commodity prices is fueled by China’s demand for speculative inventory.
sentences.chinese: 中國投機性存貨引起了大宗商品價格的上揚。

sentences.english: Rising prices stand to benefit the commodity-producing economies.
sentences.chinese: 價格上漲會有利於大宗商品生產國。

sentences.english: Growth in emerging markets has underpinned demand for scarce commodities.
sentences.chinese: 新興市場的增長支撐了對稀缺大宗商品的需求。

sentences.english: Stocks of thermal coal, used to fire power stations, are among those to have been drawn down.
sentences.chinese: 庫存下降的大宗商品包括用於火力發電站的熱煤。

sentences.english: It is ironic that extreme differentiation results in commoditization.
sentences.chinese: 諷刺的是，極度差異化反而會造成大宗商品化。

sentences.english: Chinese banks lend for commodity purchases with the underlying commodities as collaterals.
sentences.chinese: 中資銀行爲大宗商品購買放款，並以該商品作爲抵押。

sentences.english: Which insiders are selling and buying chunks of stocks?
sentences.chinese: 內幕人士買進賣出的大宗股票是哪些？

definition: sect/school (group of followers of a particular doctrine)
Neimen township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs
head of a clan/natural leader/person of prestige and authority in a domain/suzerain
Yuncheng district of Yunfu city 雲浮市|云浮市[Yun2 fu2 shi4], Guangdong
paraphernalia of a guard of honor
to perform one's job/attendant/job/duties/(respectful appellation for the addressee) you/your Excellency/(Church) deacon
